name: 3 . . . 2 . . . 1 . . .
effect:
Play 3 . . . 2 . . . 1 . . . only during the combat phase and only if you control a Villains United character.

If 3 . . . 2 . . . 1 . . . is in your resource row, KO 3 . . . 2 . . . 1 . . . and KO target location. Otherwise, replace that location.
"The Crisis has begun."

name: A Moment of Crisis
effect:
Choose an identity. Characters you control gain the chosen identity this turn.

If you control a JSA character and A Moment of Crisis is in your resource row, draw a card.
Know thyselves.

name: Abjuration, Magic
effect:
As an additional cost to play Abjuration, pay 5 endurance.

Target Shadowpact defender gets +3 DEF this attack.

Ongoing: At the start of the build phase, gain 5 endurance if you have 10 or less endurance.

name: Absolute Dominance
effect: Ongoing: Whenever a character with cost 2 or less becomes stunned, remove it from the game.
"Good and evil are just words. Power is absolute."

name: Adam Strange, Champion of Rann
effect:
Reservist

Reveal Adam Strange >>> KO target character with cost 1. If you do, KO Adam Strange. You may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row. Use this power only while Adam Strange is in your resource row and only during the recovery phase.

name: Adrian Chase as Vigilante, Street Justice
effect:
Concealed

Backup: Activate >>> Whenever target character you control becomes stunned by an attacker this turn, stun that attacker. Use this power only during the build phase.

name: Advance Warning
effect: Target JSA defender you control gets +2 DEF this attack. If that character is exhausted, it gets an additional +2 DEF this attack, and each opponent gains 3 endurance.
"Call it 'pre-traumatic stress syndrome.'"

name: Ahmed Samsarra, White King
effect:
Loyalty—Reveal, Concealed—Optional

When Ahmed Samsarra is put into a KO'd pile from play, you lose the game.

Activate >>> KO a resource you control. If you do, search your deck for a location card, reveal it, put it face down into your resource row, and shuffle your deck.

name: Alan Scott as Sentinel, Golden Age Guardian
effect:
Willpower 6

At the start of the combat phase, if you have played no plot twists this turn, you may have JSA characters you control get +3 ATK / +3 DEF while in combat with a character with greater cost this turn. If you do, you cannot play plot twists this turn.
"I wrote the book on willpower."

name: Alexander Luthor, Diabolical Double
effect:
When Alexander Luthor comes into play, draw two cards.

Boost 1: When Alexander Luthor comes into play, you may put up to two Villains United character cards each with cost 3 or less from your hand into your front row.
"Of course there's another Luthor, you fool! It's me."

name: Alexander Luthor, Duplicitous Doppelganger
effect: Activate >>> If Alexander Luthor is in play, search your deck for a character card with vengeance, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Put Alexander Luthor on the top of your deck.

name: Alexander Luthor, Insidious Impostor
effect:
When Alexander Luthor comes into play, draw a card.

Discard a Villains United character card >>> Alexander Luthor gets +2 ATK this attack.
Ref:CIE1: SECURITY BREACH. FILE CORRUPTED.

name: Allied Against the Dark, Team-Up
effect:
As an additional cost to play Allied Against the Dark, choose up to two team affiliations among characters you control.

Ongoing: Crossover the chosen affiliations.

Exhausted JSA defenders you control get +1 ATK.

name: Amadeus Arkham, Architect of Insanity
effect: Discard Amadeus Arkham >>> Whenever target attacker you control stuns an exhausted defender this turn, search your deck for a location card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Use this power only if Amadeus Arkham is in your hand.

name: Amanda Waller, Queen
effect:
Concealed

Boost X: When Amanda Waller comes into play, gain 2 resource points for each resource point you paid for X. Spend these resource points only to recruit Checkmate character cards.

name: Amulet of Nabu, Fate Artifact
effect:
Unique, Concealed—Optional

Equipped character can be equipped with any number of Fate Artifacts.

Equipped character gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF for each Fate Artifact you control and has flight and range.

name: Animal Man, Buddy Baker
effect: Whenever Animal Man attacks or defends, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on him.
"The Spectre has severed my connection to the Lifeweb. If I can't sense the animals, I can't draw upon their power."

name: Annihilation Protocol as OMAC Robot, Army
effect:
Exhaust a non-Army character you control >>> KO target stunned character.

Boost 2: When Annihilation Protocol comes into play, you may distribute five +1 ATK / +1 DEF counters as you choose among up to five characters you control with the identity OMAC Robot.

name: Arms Deal
effect:
Play Arms Deal only during your recruit step.

Discard up to six cards. You may put a Villains United character card from your hand with cost less than the number of cards you discarded into your front row if you don't control a character with the same name as that card.

name: Arthur Kendrick, Knight
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)

Backup: Activate >>> Target character you control cannot be stunned while attacking this turn. Use this power only during the build phase.
"This is White Queen's Knight. I have the target in sight. Ten seconds to contact."

name: Aspiring Pawn, Army
effect:
Concealed

Whenever Aspiring Pawn causes breakthrough while attacking a player directly, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on Aspiring Pawn, and it loses the version Army and gains the version Knight.

name: Atom Smasher, Al Rothstein
effect:
Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.)

Activate >>> Put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on Atom Smasher.
"All my life, I've wanted to join the JSA. It's all I've ever wanted."

name: Baddest of the Bad
effect:
As an additional cost to play Baddest of the Bad, return a Villains United character you control to its owner's hand.

Search your deck for an affiliated character card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Barbara Gordon as Oracle, Data Broker
effect:
Concealed

Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may exhaust Barbara Gordon. If you do, draw a card.
Information is your most valuable ally.

name: Bart Allen as The Flash, Impulsive Speedster
effect:
Bart Allen does not exhaust to attack.

Whenever Bart Allen stuns a defender or causes breakthrough, Bart Allen cannot attack this turn.

Bart Allen cannot attack the same character more than once per turn.

name: Batman, Earth 2
effect: Exhaust an Earth 2 character you control, discard a card >>> Target player replaces a non–Team-Up location or non–Team-Up ongoing plot twist he controls. Use this power only once per turn.
This Batman traded his mask for a badge to fight crime as Commissioner Wayne.

name: Bizarro, ME AM BIZARRO #1
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Bizarro becomes stunned, target opponent gains 4 endurance.
Ref:MoS5: "Not sure he gets the concept of 'vengeance' . . . or 'united.'"

name: Black Adam, Lord of Kahndaq
effect: Discard a Villains United character card >>> Characters you control get +1 ATK / +1 DEF this turn.
To most, he is a symbol of evil, but to his people, he is a bastion of strength.

name: Black Adam, Ruthless Hero
effect:
Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.)

Exhausted JSA characters you control get +2 ATK.
"I swear it all ends now: As long as I have this power, no more innocents will die."

name: Black Adam, Teth-Adam
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Black Adam becomes stunned, target character gets -3 ATK / -3 DEF this turn.
Ref:MF1: "Thinks his code of honor makes him better than us. I can use that."

name: Black Alice, Lori Zechlin
effect: Pay half your endurance, rounded up >>> Black Alice gets +3 ATK / +3 DEF this attack. Use this power only once per turn and only if Black Alice is in combat.
"She's Earth's mightiest goth chick."

name: Black Thorn, Elizabeth Thorne
effect:
Loyalty—Reveal, Concealed

Backup: Activate >>> Ready a location you control. Use this power only during the build phase and only once per turn.
"You should have known better than to come looking for me."

name: Blackbriar Thorn, Druid of Cymru
effect:
Willpower 1

Whenever you play a Magic plot twist, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on Blackbriar Thorn.
"Ol' Thorny can regrow himself, and I'm guessing that means there's also no limit to how big he can get."

name: Blinding Rage
effect: Target attacker you control gets +4 ATK / -4 DEF this attack.
"Calm down, Bruce! Think it through. We don't have any other choice."

name: Blue Devil, Big Blue
effect:
When Blue Devil comes into play, lose 4 endurance.

When Blue Devil leaves play, gain 8 endurance. (You gain the endurance even if he is stunned.)
"Our heavy hitter used to be a stuntman, but a magical accident turned him big, mean, and blue."

name: Blue Devil, Dan Cassidy
effect:
When Blue Devil comes into play, lose 4 endurance.

When Blue Devil leaves play, gain 6 endurance. (You gain the endurance even if he is stunned.)
"Lately, all Big Blue does with his powers is throw drunks like me out of the Oblivion."

name: Brainiac, Earth 2
effect:
Concealed—Optional

Discard an Anti-Matter or Earth 2 character card >>> Target character gets -1 ATK / -1 DEF this turn.

Boost 1: When Brainiac comes into play, put two +1 ATK / +1 DEF counters on Brainiac.

name: Brother Eye
effect:
Activate >>> Target Checkmate attacker you control gets +1 ATK this attack for each location you control.

Activate >>> Return target Army Checkmate character card from your KO'd pile to your hand.
" . . . and I am alive."

name: Brother I Satellite
effect:
Brother I Satellite is not unique.

When you flip Brother I Satellite, you may discard a character card. If you do, search your deck for a Checkmate character card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"I am Brother Eye . . ."

name: Brothers in Arms
effect:
As an additional cost to play Brothers in Arms, exhaust a non-attacking, non-defending JSA character you control.

Target attacker or defender you control gets +X ATK this attack, where X is the ATK of the character you exhausted.
"Know this: Though we are no longer enemies, we will never be friends."

name: Burning Gaze
effect: Target character you control gets +1 ATK / +2 DEF while attacking this turn and has range this turn.
"I don't know what you are, but your path of destruction stops here."

name: Captain Marvel, Champion of Magic
effect:
Loyalty

Pay 25 endurance >>> You win the game.
"We gave him all the magical power in the universe to fight the Spectre—that might give us half a chance."

name: Captain Marvel, Earth's Mightiest Mortal
effect:
Reservist

Captain Marvel does not come into play with a cosmic counter.

Discard a JSA character card, say "Shazam!" >>> Put a cosmic counter on Captain Marvel.

Cosmic: Captain Marvel gets +13 ATK / +13 DEF and has flight.

name: Carter Hall as Hawkman, Eternal Champion
effect: Carter Hall gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF for each exhausted, non-stunned, non-Army character you control.
"You may have trained for a lifetime—but I've trained for hundreds."

name: Catman, Thomas Blake
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)

Other stunned characters you control cannot be KO'd by effects your opponents control.
"In this world, there are predators and prey. Being prey grew tiresome."

name: Charles McNider as Dr. Mid-Nite, Golden Age Academic
effect:
Reservist, Concealed

Activate >>> Move target character you control to your hidden or visible area.
"Lights out."

name: Chay-Ara as Hawkgirl, Eternal Companion
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Chay-Ara becomes stunned, you may KO her. If you do, search your deck for a card that shares a name or identity with Chay-Ara, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"When I looked into his eyes, our Ka joined as one."

name: Check and Mate!
effect:
Play Check and Mate! only during the draw phase.

As an additional cost to play Check and Mate!, discard a Checkmate character card.

If you have not played another card named Check and Mate! this game, characters cost 1 more to recruit this turn.

name: Checkmate Armory
effect:
Equipped characters you control get +1 ATK.

Activate, pay 1 resource point >>> Search your deck for an equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Use this power only if you control a Checkmate character.

name: Checkmate Safe House, Team-Up
effect:
Checkmate Safe House is not unique.

As an additional cost to flip Checkmate Safe House, choose up to two team affiliations among characters you control.

Crossover the chosen affiliations.

Activate >>> Checkmate characters you control get +1 DEF while defending in your support row this turn.

name: Cheetah, Feral Feline
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Cheetah becomes stunned, characters you control get +1 ATK this turn.
Ref:WW2.8: "Hurt her in any way, and Cheetah will tear you to shreds."

name: Cheshire, Jade
effect:
Whenever a Secret Six character you control attacks, gain 1 endurance.

Whenever a Villains United character you control attacks, target opponent loses 1 endurance.
"Tell Mockingbird I quit."

name: Chimp Detective Agency
effect: Activate, pay 3 endurance >>> Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed Shadowpact character card into your hand and the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck.
"This ain't no monkey business."

name: Christopher Smith as Peacemaker, Obsessed Outlaw
effect:
Concealed—Optional

Backup: Activate >>> Whenever target character you control stuns a defender this turn, you may stun a character with cost 3 or less. Use this power only during the build phase.
"Sometimes peace has to be won at the end of a gun."

name: Cloak of Nabu, Fate Artifact
effect:
Unique, Concealed—Optional

Equipped character can be equipped with any number of Fate Artifacts.

Equipped character gets +1 DEF and cannot be the target of effects your opponents control.

name: Coercion, Team-Up
effect:
Play Coercion only if you control a Villains United character.

As an additional cost to play Coercion, reveal a character card from your hand and choose one or more of its team affiliations.

Ongoing: Crossover Villains United and the chosen affiliations.

name: Collecting Souls, Magic
effect:
Target Shadowpact character gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF this turn, and you lose 1 endurance.

Ongoing: Pay 1 resource point >>> Remove a character card in a KO'd pile from the game. If you do, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on a character you control. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Conjuration, Magic
effect:
Play Conjuration only during your recruit step.

You may pay 15 endurance. If you do, gain 1 resource point. Spend this resource point only to recruit a character card with the printed Shadowpact affiliation.
At last, the balance shifts . . .

name: Connie Webb, Knight
effect: Activate >>> If Connie Webb is in play, search your deck for a Checkmate character card with cost 4 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Put Connie Webb on the top of your deck.

name: Count Vertigo, Werner Vertigo
effect: Return Count Vertigo to his owner's hand >>> Exhaust target character. Use this power only during your attack step.
Ref:WFC251: "Insane ruler of Vlatavia. Inner ear disorder. Expendable."

name: Deadshot, Dead Aim
effect:
Concealed—Optional

Exhaust a character you control with cost 3 or greater >>> Put Deadshot from your KO'd pile into your front row if you don't control a character named Deadshot. Use this power only during the build phase and only if Deadshot is in your KO'd pile.
"Aiming is for amateurs."

name: Death from Above
effect:
Target character you control gets +1 ATK this turn and has flight this turn.

Ongoing: Pay 1 resource point >>> Target character you control gets +2 ATK this turn and has flight this turn. Use this power only once per turn.
What goes up must come down.

name: Deathstroke the Terminator, Lethal Weapon
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Deathstroke the Terminator becomes stunned, target opponent loses 4 endurance.
Ref:NTT1-2: "When you absolutely, positively have to kill every superhero in the room."

name: Deathstroke the Terminator, Ultimate Assassin
effect:
Loyalty

Vengeance: Whenever Deathstroke the Terminator becomes stunned, if you have played no plot twists this turn, you may KO target character. If you do, you cannot play plot twists this turn.

name: Defend Yourself!
effect: Target defender gets +3 ATK this attack and an additional +3 ATK this attack if it is exhausted.
"You may kill me, but I'm not going down without a fight."

name: Deflection
effect: Exhaust any number of characters you control. Target defender gets +X DEF this attack, where X is the number of characters you exhausted.
"I didn't ask for your help."

name: Detective Chimp, Bobo T. Chimpanzee
effect:
Loyalty—Reveal, Concealed

Pay 1 endurance >>> Choose a team affiliation. Affiliated characters you control and affiliated character cards you own in all zones gain the chosen affiliation this turn. Use this power only once per turn.
"Let me tell you about my friends . . . "

name: Detective Chimp, Shoeless Gumshoe
effect: Remove Detective Chimp from the game >>> Search your deck for a Shadowpact character card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Use this power only if Detective Chimp is in your hand and only if you have 25 or less endurance.
"Everybody sucks but me."

name: Divination, Magic
effect:
As an additional cost to play Divination, discard a Shadowpact character card and pay 3 endurance.

Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"The cards speak of impending doom."

name: Dodge the Bullet
effect: Remove target Secret Six character you control from the game. At the start of the next draw phase, return it to your front row if you don't control a character with the same name as the character you removed. If that character was stunned when you removed it, return it to play stunned.

name: Double Play
effect: Ready target JSA team attacker you control that shares an identity with another attacker you control. The character you readied cannot be stunned while team attacking this turn and cannot cause breakthrough this turn.
"If at first you don't succeed—double your efforts."

name: Dr. Fate's Tower
effect:
When you flip Dr. Fate's Tower, you may discard a card. If you do, search your deck for a Fate Artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

Backup: Activate >>> Transfer all equipment on a character you control to another character you control. Use this power only during the build phase.

name: Dr. Fate, Hector Hall
effect:
Concealed—Optional, Willpower 4

Other characters you control get +1 ATK for each equipment equipped to Dr. Fate.

Equipment you control and equipment cards you own in all zones have concealed—optional.

name: Dr. Fate, Lord of Order
effect:
Concealed—Optional, Willpower 4

When Dr. Fate comes into play, you may search your deck and KO'd pile for up to three Fate Artifact cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"Fate's artifacts are mine, now and forever."

name: Dr. Light, Furious Flashpoint
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Dr. Light becomes stunned, you may put a Villains United character card with cost 2 or less from your hand into your front row if you don't control a character with the same name as that card.
Ref:JLA12: "Light may deserve his vengeance, but he always goes too far."

name: Dr. Occult, Richard Occult
effect:
While you have 25 or less endurance, Dr. Occult gets +2 ATK / +2 DEF and an additional +1 ATK / +1 DEF if you have 10 or less endurance.

Boost 2: When Dr. Occult comes into play, if you don't control Rose Psychic, search your deck for a card named Rose Psychic, put it into your front row, and shuffle your deck.

name: Dr. Polaris, Force of Nature
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Dr. Polaris becomes stunned, target opponent exhausts a ready character he controls.
Ref:GL2-21: "Anyone who can pull down the moon can set his own fee."

name: Dr. Psycho, Mental Giant
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Dr. Psycho becomes stunned, you may stun target character with cost 1 or less.
Ref:WW1-5: "The most powerful being in the universe. Surpassing genius, unmatched fashion sense. Chicks dig him. (Edit: When did I write this?)"

name: Dr. Psycho, Twisted Telepath
effect: At the start of the combat phase, each player loses endurance equal to half the combined cost of all characters he controls, rounded up.
"This'll amuse me about as much as it'll hurt you."

name: Eclipso, Jean Loring
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Eclipso becomes stunned, recover target stunned character an opponent controls and move it to your hidden area.
"Magic is the source of all evil, my love. It must be purged."

name: Elimination Protocol as OMAC Robot, Army
effect:
KO a character you control >>> Recover target stunned character you control with the identity OMAC Robot. Use this power only once per turn.

Boost 2: When Elimination Protocol comes into play, search your deck for a card with cost 4 or less and the identity OMAC Robot, put it into your front row, and shuffle your deck.

name: End of All That Is
effect:
Play End of All That Is only during the combat phase.

Each player chooses a character he controls. Stun the chosen characters and then KO all other characters.
"It's here!"

name: Epic Battle
effect: Characters with cost 3 or greater get +2 ATK this turn.
"The Spectre must be stopped, no matter the cost."

name: Fatality, Flawless Victory
effect: Whenever a character with cost 3 or less becomes stunned, KO it.
"Finish him!"

name: Fate Has Spoken, Magic
effect:
If you have played no other plot twists this turn, ready target character with the name or identity Dr. Fate and lose endurance equal to its cost.

You cannot play plot twists this turn.
There is no avoiding Fate.

name: Fiddler, Isaac Bowin
effect:
You may discard a character card rather than pay Fiddler's recruit cost.

KO Fiddler >>> Return target character card from your KO'd pile to your hand.
Fiddler's first mission didn't end so well . . .

name: Forbidden Loyalties, Team-Up
effect:
As an additional cost to play Forbidden Loyalties, choose two different team affiliations among characters you control.

You may discard a card. If you do, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on target character you control.

Ongoing: Crossover the chosen affiliations.

name: Grand Gesture
effect:
As an additional cost to play Grand Gesture, return a Villains United character you control to its owner's hand.

Target defender gets -3 ATK / -3 DEF this attack.

name: Graziella Reza, Knight
effect: Exhaust a location you control >>> Graziella Reza gets +1 ATK this turn.
"Rook Control, this is White King's Knight. Deploy Gamma team to seal off the alley."

name: Harbinger, Multiverse Messenger
effect: Boost 1: When Harbinger comes into play, if you control another Crisis character, search your deck for a card named Harbinger, put it into your front row, and shuffle your deck.

name: Harry Stein, King in Check
effect:
When Harry Stein is put into a KO'd pile from play, you lose the game.

Knight characters you control get +1 ATK / +1 DEF.
Without his queen, the king will fall.

name: Helm of Nabu, Fate Artifact
effect:
Unique, Concealed—Optional

Equipped character can be equipped with any number of Fate Artifacts, gets +1 ATK, and gains the identity Dr. Fate.

When Helm of Nabu comes into play, draw a card for each Fate Artifact you control, then discard a card for each card you drew this way.

name: Help Wanted, Team-Up
effect:
As an additional cost to play Help Wanted, discard a Secret Six character card.

Reveal the top six cards of your deck. Choose a team affiliation of a revealed character card, put that card into your hand, and put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck.

Ongoing: Crossover Secret Six and the chosen affiliation.

name: Heroic Rescue
effect:
Target JSA character you control and all non-Army characters you control that share an identity with it have reinforcement this turn.

Ongoing: Pay 1 resource point >>> Target character gets +2 DEF this turn. Use this power only once per turn.
"You can thank me later."

name: Hourman III as Hourman, Time Machine
effect: Free >>> Hourman III gets +4 ATK / +4 DEF this attack, and each opponent gains 3 endurance. Use this power only once per turn.
"An hour from now or decades in the past, time is on my side."

name: House of Secrets
effect: Discard a card or pay 1 resource point >>> Gain 2 endurance and an additional 2 endurance if you control a Secret Six character. Use this power only once per turn.
"Couldn't we live somewhere a little less . . . creepy?"

name: Hunter Zolomon as Professor Zoom, Sinister Speedster
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Hunter Zolomon becomes stunned, ready target character you control. That character cannot cause breakthrough this turn.
"Youaaaaregettinnnnnngslowoldmmmannnnn."

name: Huntress, Earth 2
effect: Characters you control and character cards you own in all zones gain the version Earth 2.
"Here, my parents are enemies. They don't even know who I am!"

name: Huntress, Reluctant Queen
effect: Discard Huntress, exhaust a location you control >>> Negate target plot twist effect targeting a Checkmate or Gotham Knights character you control. Use this power only if Huntress is in your hand.
"Why are you so interested in Checkmate, Bruce?"

name: I Still Hate Magic!
effect: Target character loses flight this turn and gets -3 DEF while defending this turn.
"It's a bird! It's a plane! Oh, wait . . . it's just a pig."

name: Ibis, Prince Amentep
effect: While any opponent has more endurance than you, Ibis gets +2 ATK and has flight.
"Ibis has been around for a while. People say he ruled Egypt once. Not that that explains the turban."

name: Ishmael Gregor as Sabbac, Malevolent Marvel
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Ishmael Gregor becomes stunned, target opponent loses 3 endurance.
Ref:O3-3: "Former Russian mobster. Stole power by killing Timothy Karnes."

name: It's Not Over Yet
effect:
Play It's Not Over Yet only during the recovery phase.

As an additional cost to play It's Not Over Yet, discard a card.

Choose one: Recover target stunned Secret Six character you control; or gain endurance equal to the cost of target stunned Secret Six character you control.

name: Jacob Lee, Knight
effect:
Concealed

You may discard a location card rather than pay Jacob Lee's recruit cost.
"This isn't as easy as it looks."

name: Jaime Reyes as Blue Beetle, High-Tech Hero
effect: Exhaust a character you control and remove Jaime Reyes from the game >>> Search your deck for an equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Use this power only if Jaime Reyes is in your hand.

name: Jakeem Williams, JJ Thunder
effect:
Reservist

Activate >>> If Jakeem Williams is in play, search your deck for a JSA character card with cost 4 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Put Jakeem Williams on the top of your deck.
"So cool!"

name: Jay Garrick as The Flash, Golden Age Speedster
effect: Cosmic: Whenever Jay Garrick becomes stunned, recover and ready him, and he gets -4 ATK / -4 DEF this turn.

"You youngsters try to keep up, now."

Alternate Foil: "Let's pick up the paaaaaaaace."

name: Join Us or Die
effect: Stun target non-stunned character you control. If that character has the Villains United affiliation, you may recover it.
"Membership has its privileges."

name: JSA Headquarters
effect: Activate, exhaust a JSA character you control >>> Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put all revealed character cards into your hand and the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck. Discard a card for each card you put into your hand.

name: June Moon as Enchantress, Bad Witch
effect: Activate >>> Stun target character. If you have more than 10 endurance, that character's controller moves June Moon to his front or support row, and she gains an affiliation of that player's choice. Use this power only during your attack step.

name: June Moon as Enchantress, Good Witch
effect: Activate >>> Stun target character with cost 3 or less. If you have more than 25 endurance, that character's controller moves June Moon to his front or support row, and she gains an affiliation of that player's choice.

name: Justice United, Team-Up
effect:
As an additional cost to play Justice United, choose two different team affiliations among characters you control.

If you chose JSA and JLA, return a character card from your KO'd pile to your hand.

Ongoing: Crossover the chosen affiliations.

name: Katar Hol as Hawkman, Eternal Hero
effect:
Discard a card that shares an identity with an attacker or defender you control >>> Power-up target attacker or defender you control.

Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, it gets an additional +1 DEF this attack.
"I don't have time for pleasantries. Surrender or suffocate."

name: Kate Spencer as Manhunter, Fearless Renegade
effect:
Characters you control get +1 ATK while attacking a character with greater cost.

Free >>> Target hidden character an opponent controls can be attacked by characters you control with lesser cost this turn. Use this power only once per turn.
"There aren't many of us left. At the end of all this, I may be the only one."

name: Kendra Saunders as Hawkgirl, Eternal Heroine
effect:
Discard a card that shares an identity with an attacker or defender you control >>> Power-up target attacker or defender you control.

Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, it gets an additional +1 ATK this attack.
"What we have isn't love, Carter."

name: Kilowog, Drill Sergeant
effect: Willpower 2
"I'm back, poozers!"

name: Knight Armor
effect:
Knight Armor costs 1 less to recruit while you control a Checkmate character.

Equipped character gets +2 DEF and an additional +2 DEF while attacking.
It's bulletproof, heat-resistant, and the perfect thing for a knight on the town.

name: Knightmare Scenario
effect: Target attacker or defender you control gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack. If it has the Checkmate affiliation, you may exhaust a location you control. If you do, that character gets an additional +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack.
"I need backup . . . now!"

name: Knights' Gambit
effect:
Play Knights' Gambit only during the combat phase and only if you control a Checkmate character.

If Knights' Gambit is in your resource row, KO Knights' Gambit and KO target non–Team-Up ongoing plot twist. Otherwise, replace that plot twist.

name: Laser Watch
effect:
Concealed—Optional

Equipped character gets +2 ATK and has range.

When Laser Watch comes into play equipping a Checkmate character, you may exhaust a location you control. If you do, draw a card.

name: Leslie Thompkins's Clinic
effect:
At the start of the recovery phase, gain 1 endurance and an additional 1 endurance if you control a non-stunned Gotham Knights character.

Activate >>> Target stunned character you control cannot be KO'd during the recovery phase this turn.
"He needs rest . . . and so do you."

name: Lex Luthor as Mockingbird, Evil Exile
effect:
Concealed

Remove Lex Luthor from the game >>> Put a Secret Six character card with cost less than the number of resources you control from your hand into your front row stunned. Use this power only during the recovery phase and only if Lex Luthor is in your hand.

name: Lex Luthor, Champion of the Common Man
effect: Discard a plot twist card >>> Target character gets -2 DEF this turn and loses invulnerability this turn.
"I'm coming for you, impostor. This world belongs to me."

name: Living Legacy
effect:
As an additional cost to play Living Legacy, exhaust a JSA character you control.

Search your deck for a card that shares an identity with a character you control, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"There is solace in a good legacy, which alleviates the pain of losing friends."

name: Lois Lane, Earth 2
effect:
You may discard two cards rather than pay Lois Lane's recruit cost.

When Lois Lane comes into play, you may search your deck for an Earth 2 character card or a card named Superman, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Madame Xanadu, Cartomancer
effect: Activate >>> If Madame Xanadu is in play, search your deck for a Magic plot twist card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Put Madame Xanadu on the top of your deck.
"You will meet a mysterious stranger."

name: Magical Conduit, Magic
effect:
As an additional cost to play Magical Conduit, pay X endurance.

Target Shadowpact attacker or defender you control gets +X ATK this attack and cannot cause breakthrough this attack.
"So . . . much . . . POWER!"

name: Magical Lobotomy, Magic
effect:
Target character gets -1 DEF this turn. Whenever that character becomes powered-up this turn, it gets an additional -1 ATK / -1 DEF this turn.

Ongoing: At the start of the combat phase, you may pay 4 endurance. If you do, turn Magical Lobotomy face down.
"Tegrof."

name: Manitou Dawn, Spirit Shaman
effect:
Willpower 1

Whenever you play a Magic plot twist, gain 2 endurance.
"I do not bend the spirits to my will. They lend me their aid freely."

name: Maxwell Lord, Black King
effect:
Loyalty—Reveal

When Maxwell Lord is put into a KO'd pile from play, you lose the game.

Discard a location card >>> Target character loses all team affiliations this turn and its payment powers cannot be used this turn. Use this power only during the combat phase and only once per turn.

name: Michael Holt as Mr. Terrific, Renaissance Man
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)

Exhausted JSA characters you control get +2 ATK / +2 DEF while in combat with a character with greater cost.
"Terry used to say that nobody had to get hurt. Was he a simpler man? Or was it just a simpler time?"

name: Mordru, Dark Lord
effect: When Mordru comes into play, choose a team affiliation and an identity. Mordru gains the chosen affiliation and identity.
"The power of Fate is mine!"

name: Mourn for the Lost
effect:
As an additional cost to play Mourn for the Lost, discard a character card.

Negate target non-triggered effect from a plot twist with cost 1 or less. If you control a Gotham Knights character, draw a card.

name: Mr. Freeze, Brutal Blizzard
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Mr. Freeze becomes stunned, target character with cost 5 or less cannot ready this turn.
Ref:B121: "He crafter a world-class freeze gun that will be of use in the coming war."

name: Mr. Mxyzptlk, Troublesome Trickster
effect: At the start of your recruit step, if Mr. Mxyzptlk is in your KO'd pile, you may put him into your hand. If you do, remove all other cards in your KO'd pile named Mr. Mxyzptlk from the game.
"Nice try, Aquaman, but you're made of sand!"

name: Multiverse Power Battery
effect:
The controller of target character moves it to a different position. That player KO's an equipment equipped to that character.

Ongoing: Each Earth 2 character card you own is not unique unless you control an Earth 2 character with the same name as that card.

name: Mystical Binding, Magic
effect:
Play Mystical Binding only during your attack step and only if you control a Shadowpact character.

As an additional cost to play Mystical Binding, pay 3 endurance.

Target character gets -3 DEF this turn and cannot attack this turn.

name: Neutralization Protocol as OMAC Robot, Army
effect: Stun another character you control >>> Gain 1 resource point. Spend this resource point only to recruit a character card with the identity OMAC Robot. Use this power only once per turn and only during your recruit step.
switchfeed: OMAC 12042_paris//feedstatus_live: target_neutralized

name: Nightmaster, Demon Slayer
effect:
While you control a Shadowpact character and five or more resources, you may pay 20 endurance rather than pay Nightmaster's recruit cost.

Pay 1 resource point >>> Gain 5 endurance. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Nightmaster, Jim Rook
effect:
While you control a Shadowpact character, you may pay 3 endurance rather than pay Nightmaster's recruit cost.

Whenever you play a Magic plot twist, Nightmaster gets +2 ATK this turn, and you lose 2 endurance.

name: Nightshade, Eve Eden
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)

Pay 3 endurance >>> Nightshade gets +1 ATK this attack.
"Magical Babe Number Two is good—not Enchantress-good, but good."

name: Nightshade, Shadow Siren
effect:
Concealed—Optional

At the start of your attack step, if you have 25 or less endurance, you may have the controller of target unprotected character move it to his hidden area.
"She hits harder than Enchantress, though. Ouch."

name: No Hope
effect:
Play No Hope only if you control a Villains United character.

Target character loses reinforcement and cannot have reinforcement this turn.

Ongoing: Pay 1 resource point >>> Target player loses 3 endurance. Use this power only once per turn.

name: No Mercy
effect:
As an additional cost to play No Mercy, return a Villains United character you control to its owner's hand.

KO target stunned character with cost 4 or less.
There's a fine line between justice and vengeance.

name: Obsidian, Todd James Rice
effect:
Willpower 2

KO a resource you control >>> Target character you control gets +1 ATK this turn for each face-up resource you control. Use this power only once per turn.
"It's time for everyone else to look into the abyss."

name: Parademon, Apokoliptian Ally
effect: Reveal Parademon >>> Whenever a Secret Six character you control with cost 4 or greater becomes stunned this turn, you may put a card named Parademon from your hand into your front row if you don't control a character named Parademon. Use this power only if Parademon is in your hand.
"You killed Clown!"

name: Pariah, Herald of Doom
effect: When Pariah comes into play, you may search your deck for a card with cost 8 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"It's coming!"

name: Pawn of the Black King
effect:
As an additional cost to play Pawn of the Black King, discard a Checkmate character card and exhaust a location you control.

Target character loses all team affiliations and cannot have team affiliations other than Checkmate this turn.
"Doomsday killed Lois, Superman. Make him pay."

name: Power Girl, Earth 2
effect:
Power Girl gets +4 ATK / +4 DEF while in combat with a character with greater cost.

Boost 2: When Power Girl comes into play, Earth 2 characters you control get +4 ATK / +4 DEF while in combat with a character with greater cost this turn.
"At last, I know who I am."

name: Prince Khufu as Hawkman, Eternal Warrior
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Prince Khufu becomes stunned, you may KO him. If you do, search your deck for a card that shares a name or identity with Prince Khufu, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"She is my beloved, in this life and all others."

name: Ragdoll, Resilient Rogue
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Ragdoll becomes stunned, you may discard a character card. If you do, recover Ragdoll at the start of the recovery phase this turn.
"Please, don't call me Clown."

name: Ragman, Patchmonger
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Ragman becomes stunned, you may remove a character card in a KO'd pile from the game. If you do, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on Ragman.
"This guy and his damned clothes . . ."

name: Ragman, Redeemer of Souls
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Ragman becomes stunned, you may remove up to two character cards in target player's KO'd pile from the game. Put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on Ragman for each card you removed.
"Rags doesn't just lock up the criminals—he locks up their souls."

name: Rann
effect:
You cannot flip Rann if you control Thanagar.

Affiliated characters you control gain the Rann affiliation.

Activate >>> Target attacker or defender you control gets +1 ATK this attack.

name: Relentless Pursuit
effect:
The controller of target character moves it to his visible area.

Characters you control get +1 ATK while attacking that character this turn.
"Okay, I guess we're doing this the hard way."

name: Removed from Continuity
effect:
As an additional cost to play Removed from Continuity, exhaust a DC character you control.

Remove target stunned non-Army character from the game. You may discard a card. If you do, search that character's controller's deck, hand, and KO'd pile for all cards with the same printed name and version as that character and remove them from the game, and that player shuffles his deck.

name: Retrieval Protocol as OMAC Robot, Army
effect: Discard a character or location card >>> Characters you control with the identity OMAC Robot get +1 ATK / +1 DEF this turn. Use this power only once per turn.
switchfeed: OMAC 4252_tibet//feedstatus_live: target_retrieved

name: Return Fire!
effect:
As an additional cost to play Return Fire!, exhaust a non-defending character you control or a Villains United defender you control.

The controller of target attacker loses endurance equal to that attacker's cost.

name: Return of Donna Troy
effect: Choose one: Return target character card from your KO'd pile to your hand; or return target Teen Titans character you control to its owner's hand.
"Miss me?"

name: Revitalize
effect: Exhaust any number of characters you control. Recover target stunned character if its cost is less than the combined cost of the characters you exhausted.
"I'm here, Dad. Just hold on a little longer."

name: Rex Tyler as Hourman, Inventor of Miraclo
effect: Free >>> Rex Tyler gets +4 ATK / +4 DEF this attack, and each opponent gains 3 endurance. Use this power only once per turn.
"Okay, you goons, I can give you an hour of my time."

name: Richard Tyler as Hourman, Man of the Hour
effect: Free >>> Richard Tyler gets +4 ATK / +4 DEF this attack, and each opponent gains 3 endurance. Use this power only once per turn.
"You thugs don't stand a chance. I knew how this fight would turn out an hour ago."

name: Rook Control
effect:
Rook Control is not unique.

Activate >>> Move a hidden character you control to your visible area. If you do, move target visible Checkmate character you control to your hidden area.
"Knight, your target is two floors up and one room over."

name: Rose Psychic, Ghost Detective
effect:
Concealed—Optional

At the start of the combat phase, lose 3 endurance.

At the start of the recovery phase, gain 6 endurance.

Boost 3: When Rose Psychic comes into play, if you don't control Dr. Occult, search your deck for a card named Dr. Occult, put it into your front row, and shuffle your deck.

name: Roy Harper as Arsenal, Knight
effect:
Exhaust two locations you control >>> Roy Harper gets +1 ATK this turn.

Activate, KO a resource you control >>> Stun target attacker with ATK less than Roy Harper's ATK.
Checkmate turned Speedy into Arsenal.

name: Sand, Sanderson Hawkins
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Sand becomes stunned and you control no other ready characters, recover Sand at the start of the recovery phase this turn.
Nowadays, people know better than to call him "Sandy, the Golden Boy."

name: Sarge Steel, Knight
effect:
If a character protected by Sarge Steel would become stunned, instead, you may stun Sarge Steel.

Boost 1: When Sarge Steel comes into play, you may KO target character with cost 1.
For a man with a steel hand, everybody's got a glass jaw.

name: Sasha Bordeaux, Autonomous Prototype
effect: At the start of the combat phase, if you have played no plot twists this turn, you may have Checkmate characters you control get +2 ATK / +2 DEF this turn. If you do, you cannot play plot twists this turn.
"I'm not a machine! [nanobyte upload complete]"

name: Sasha Bordeaux, Knight
effect:
Sasha Bordeaux gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF while equipped.

Knight team attackers you control get +1 ATK.
"Black King's Knight to Alpha team. Hold your positions. This one's mine."

name: Scandal, Savage Spawn
effect: Remove Scandal from the game >>> If you control a Secret Six character, search your deck for an ongoing plot twist card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Use this power only if Scandal is in your hand.

name: Secret Checkmate HQ
effect:
Flip Secret Checkmate HQ only if you control a defender.

Checkmate characters you control get +2 ATK.

At the start of the combat phase, replace Secret Checkmate HQ.

name: Secret Six Victorius
effect: Ongoing: At the start of your recruit step, if you control exactly six characters with the printed Secret Six affiliation, you win the game.
"So, what do we do now?"

name: Seiobo's Garden
effect: Activate >>> Put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on target stunned League of Assassins character you control.
It was a place of peace, a place of power, and where the Demon's Head was truly born.

name: Shazam, The Sorcerer
effect:
Loyalty—Reveal, Willpower 6

At the start of the combat phase, if you have played no plot twists this turn, you may have target opponent's endurance total become equal to yours. If you do, you cannot play plot twists this turn.
"Speak my name, Billy."

name: Sinestro, Villain Reborn
effect:
Willpower 3

Vengeance: Whenever Sinestro becomes stunned, your opponents cannot play plot twists this turn.
Ref:GL2-7: "While imprisoned in the Central Power Battery, he thought of nothing but revenge."

name: Spectral Slaughter, Magic
effect:
Play Spectral Slaughter only during your attack step.

As an additional cost to play Spectral Slaughter, discard a Shadowpact character card.

Stun all characters with cost 2 or less. Lose 1 endurance for each character stunned this way.

name: Stargirl, Courtney Whitmore
effect: Stargirl gets +3 DEF while exhausted.
"Write this to your mom: 'Dear Mom—Got my butt kicked today!'"

name: Stepping Between Worlds, Magic
effect:
Play Stepping Between Worlds only during the combat phase and only if you control a Shadowpact character.

The controller of target unprotected, unequipped character moves it to his hidden area. Lose endurance equal to that character's cost.

name: Superboy, Earth Prime
effect: Cosmic: Whenever Superboy becomes stunned, gain 3 endurance and target opponent loses 3 endurance.

name: Superman, Earth 2
effect:
Ally: Whenever an exhausted character you control becomes powered-up while in combat with a character with greater cost, that exhausted character gets an additional +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack.

Boost 1: When Superman comes into play, put two +1 ATK / +1 DEF counters on each Earth 2 character you control.

name: Surveillance Pawn, Army
effect:
Concealed

Backup: Activate >>> Non-Army characters you control get +1 ATK this turn. Use this power only during the build phase.
All warfare is deception.

name: Systematic Torture
effect:
As an additional cost to play Systematic Torture, exhaust a Villains United character you control.

KO target stunned character. If you do, that character's controller loses 3 endurance.
"Even your dreams will be of pain."

name: T-Spheres
effect:
Concealed—Optional

T-Spheres costs 1 less to recruit while you control a JSA character.

Equipped character gets +3 ATK / +3 DEF while in combat with a character with greater cost.

name: Taking Up the Mantle
effect:
As an additional cost to play Taking Up the Mantle, remove a JSA character card in your KO'd pile from the game and choose a character you control.

Put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on the chosen character.

Ongoing: The chosen character gains the identities of the card you removed.

name: Talia, Beloved Betrayer
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Talia becomes stunned, target stunned character cannot be KO'd during the recovery phase this turn.
Ref:DC411: "Her obsession with the Bat may divide her loyalties."
attributes: • Team Affiliation: Villains United / League of Assassins

name: Talia, Daughter of Madness
effect: Whenever you discard a character card with cost 2 or less, if it is the first card you have discarded this turn, you may put it from your KO'd pile into your front row if you don't control a character with the same name as that card.
attributes: • Team Affiliation: Villains United / League of Assassins

name: Target Acquired
effect: Exhaust any number of locations you control. Target Checkmate attacker or defender you control gets +2 ATK this attack and an additional +1 ATK this attack for each location you exhausted.
"Countermeasures engaged."

name: Ted Grant as Wildcat, Golden Age Pugilist
effect: Ted Grant gets +3 ATK while exhausted.
"Ready for a good, old-fashioned knuckleduster?"

name: Terry Sloane as Mr. Terrific, Golden Age Gold Medalist
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)

Exhausted characters you control get +1 ATK / +1 DEF while in combat with a character with greater cost.
"Play hard, but play fair. That way, nobody has to get hurt."

name: Thanagar
effect:
You cannot flip Thanagar if you control Rann.

Affiliated characters you control gain the Thanagar affiliation.

Activate >>> Target attacker or defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack.

name: Thanagarian Invasion
effect:
Characters you control with cost 2 or greater get +1 ATK while attacking this turn and have flight this turn.

Ongoing: Pay 1 resource point >>> Target character you control gets +3 ATK this turn. Use this power only once per turn.

name: The Calculator, Crime Broker
effect:
Concealed

Discard a Villains United character card >>> Target player loses 2 endurance.
"My fee is high because I get results."

name: The Calculator, Evil Oracle
effect:
Concealed

Return a character you control to its owner's hand >>> Target Villains United character you control gets +2 ATK / +2 DEF this turn. Use this power only once per turn.
Ref:DC463: "System Admin Password Accepted. Welcome, Noah."

name: The Calculator, Noah Kuttler
effect:
Vengeance: Whenever The Calculator becomes stunned, you may return him to his owner's hand.

Discard The Calculator >>> Search your deck for a card named Coercion, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Use this power only if The Calculator is in your hand.

name: The Conclave, Magic
effect:
Play The Conclave only if you control a Shadowpact character.

As an additional cost to play The Conclave pay 4 endurance.

Negate target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist.

name: The Joker, Permanent Vacation
effect: Free >>> Each opponent draws cards equal to the number of cards in his hand. Use this power only once per turn.
What happens in Gotham stays in Gotham.

name: The Monitor, Guardian of the Multiverse
effect:
Characters and resources you control cannot be KO'd by effects your opponents control.

Whenever a character you control becomes stunned, recover it.
Born of the Multiverse, he gave his life to save it.

name: The Oblivion Bar
effect:
Activate, pay 3 endurance >>> Put a power counter on The Oblivion Bar.

Activate, remove a power counter from The Oblivion Bar >>> If you control a Shadowpact character, gain 5 endurance.
Three drink minimum.

name: The Penguin, Arms Merchant
effect: When The Penguin comes into play, each player draws a card and then discards two cards or a location card.
He's moving up in the world.

name: The Phantom Stranger, Fallen Angel
effect:
Willpower 5

Remove The Phantom Stranger from the game >>> Target Shadowpact attacker or defender gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack and an additional +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack if you have 10 or less endurance. Use this power only if The Phantom Stranger is in your hand.

name: The Phantom Stranger, Wandering Hero
effect:
Willpower 5

Discard The Phantom Stranger >>> Power-up target JSA attacker or defender. Use this power only if The Phantom Stranger is in your hand.

Exhaust two characters you control >>> Return The Phantom Stranger from your KO'd pile to your hand. Use this power only during the build phase and only if The Phantom Stranger is in your KO'd pile.

name: The Rock of Eternity
effect: At the start of your attack step, ready each JSA character you control that was exhausted as your attack step started and exhaust each other character you control.
Overlooking the entrance to the cave, the Seven Sins of Man await the false step that will set them free.

name: The Science Spire
effect: Activate, return a Villains United character you control to its owner's hand >>> Draw X cards and then discard X cards, where X is the cost of the character you returned.

name: The Spectre, Soulless
effect:
Concealed

Vengeance: Whenever The Spectre becomes stunned, stun all characters.
"Judgment has come upon you. You cannot hide. You cannot escape. You can only die."

name: Threat Neutralized
effect:
Target Checkmate character you control gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF this turn.

Ongoing: If a card would be put into a KO'd pile from play, instead, remove it from the game.
"Elimination protocol complete."

name: Thunderbolt, YZ
effect:
Reservist

Activate, discard two JSA character cards or a card named Jakeem Williams >>> Search your deck for a card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Use this power only once per turn.
"Your wish is my command, my main man!"

name: Traitor to the Cause
effect:
As an additional cost to play Traitor to the Cause, stun a front row character you control.

Recover target stunned Checkmate character you control.
"We used to be better than this."

name: Transmutation, Magic
effect:
As an additional cost to play Transmutation, pay 3 endurance.

Replace target non–Team-Up location or non–Team-Up ongoing plot twist.
"You'll have to do better than that. I get out of tougher traps in my act."

name: Tricked-Out Sports Car
effect:
You may exhaust a location you control rather than pay Tricked-Out Sports Car's recruit cost.

Equipped character gets +2 ATK / +1 DEF and has flight and range.
"Can I drive?"

name: True Name, Magic
effect:
Play True Name only during the build phase and only if you control a Shadowpact character.

Lose 5 endurance.

Ongoing: At the start of the combat phase, you may replace True Name. If you do, gain 5 endurance.
"Begone, or I'll speak it."

name: Ultra-Humanite, Metahuman Manipulator
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Ultra-Humanite becomes stunned, you may KO him. If you do, move target character to your front row.
With Johnny Thunder's body, he got the Thunderbolt. With the Thunderbolt, he got the world.

name: Valentina Vostok as Negative Woman, Bishop
effect:
Concealed

Backup: Activate >>> Characters your opponents control get -3 DEF this turn while Valentina Vostok remains exhausted. Use this power only during the build phase.
Everyone has a weakness. She'll find yours.

name: Watch the Birdie!
effect: The controller of target character moves it to his visible area. That character gets -3 ATK while defending this turn.
"Bet you didn't see this coming."

name: Weather Wizard, Mark Mardon
effect: Vengeance: Whenever Weather Wizard becomes stunned, characters you control get +1 ATK / +1 DEF this turn and have flight this turn.
"Today's forecast calls for PAIN!"

name: Wesley Dodds as The Sandman, Golden Age Gunman
effect:
Reservist

At the start of the combat phase, if you have the initiative, target player exhausts a ready character he controls. That character cannot ready this turn.
"Tell Sandy I'm sorry, but it's his turn to dream now."

name: Witchfire, Rebecca Carstairs
effect:
Willpower 3

Whenever Witchfire stuns a character and you have 25 or less endurance, gain endurance equal to that character's cost.
"This witch is hot!"

name: Wonder Woman, Earth 2
effect:
Willpower 3

Earth 2 defenders you control have reinforcement.
"Where is my Themyscira? Hera help me, in this world, I am queen of nothing!"

name: Zatanna, Magical Manipulator
effect:
Willpower 2

Whenever you play a Magic plot twist, you may pay 3 endurance. If you do, draw a card.
"Magic Babe Numero Uno, no ifs, ands, or buts."

name: Zatanna, Showstopper
effect:
Willpower 5

Pay 3 endurance >>> If you control another Shadowpact character, draw a card.
"Drac a kcip. Drac yna."

name: Zazzala as Queen Bee, Mistress of the Hive
effect:
Concealed—Optional

Whenever a character leaves play during the combat phase, target opponent loses 2 endurance. (This power triggers if Zazzala is stunned when she leaves play.)
"Protect the Hive with your liveszzzz!"
